results.title: Head-up tilt test in complicated neurocardiogenic syncope in children.
results.text_hl: During follow-up, 7 became asymptomatic (2 with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) and 5 were stationary.
